name: TigerTag
overview:
TigerTag is a free, global lost and found service. TigerTag helps recover lost items by providing unique ID’s on the tag affixed to a personal device, making it identifiable to a potential finder.

If someone finds your item, they’re directed to the TigerTag website, which triggers an immediate e-mail to you. At that point, you can connect directly with them, or have us retrieve the item and ship it directly to you.

It’s important that you keep your information up to date so we can find you. Just three easy steps, and you’re covered:

1 - Apply the TigerTag to your item.

2 - Activate the tag by filling out the form at the TigerTag website.

milestones.description: TigerTag is selected for the first installment of the Open Angel Forum in Los Angeles
